attributes.action: Govt to provide Met Office explanation for sharply discontinuous ´con´trails.
attributes.additional_details: Government will do everything possible to avoid answering because this exposes so much dishonesty. Google for more.
attributes.background: Met Office Officially denies existence of chemtrails damaging UK environment. Then how do they explain discontinuous ´con´trails. Discontinuity proves chemtrail spray interrupted by concerned pilots to expose life threatening untruth.
